data.text: @starvancouver @manifesto2000 And what is the rational for barring unvaccinated health care workers. There’s been ongoing cases as outbreaks among the fully vaccinated. We all know the vax doesn’t halt transmission. Those healthcare workers who worked all through this, deserve to return.

@starvancouver @manifesto2000 Last week my good friend (single dad/sole provider for his child), was contacted by the regional director of his 13 yr federal job, and told that his request for accommodation was denied. He works fr home. Very healthy. Laid off on April 1 due to no vax.
